DOC.brief_summary: The investigator evaluate extubation time recovery profile child undergo entropion surgery .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Preoperative Ketamine Emergence Characteristics Children Undergoing Entropion Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare extubation time recovery profile ( degree postoperative agitation cough ) sevoflurane group desflurane group . General anesthesia maintain sevoflurane 2-3vol % desflurane 6-7vol % . After surgery , investigator measure duration extubation recovery profile two group .
DOC.criteria: American society anesthesiologist class 1 patient 36 year child undergo entropion surgery Do agree participate study
